sections.heading: information; report changes.A home inspector shall report a change in information required by section 76-3602 or 76-3603 within forty-five calendar days of such change
sections.text: SourceLaws 2021, LB423, ยง 4;Laws 2023, LB531, ยง 31.

76-3604.Required information; report changes.

A home inspector shall report a change in information required by section 76-3602 or 76-3603 within forty-five calendar days of such change.

SourceLaws 2021, LB423, ยง 4;Laws 2023, LB531, ยง 31.
